<h3 id="X38081">X(38081) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(5), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4-12*(b+c)*a^3+(7*b^2+24*b*c+7*c^2)*a^2+12*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-11*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38081) = 4*X(2)-X(1483) = 5*X(2)+X(12645) = 7*X(2)-X(34748) = 11*X(2)-5*X(37624) = 5*X(5)-2*X(3656) = X(5)+2*X(3679) = 11*X(5)-2*X(7982) = 19*X(5)-10*X(11522) = 3*X(5)-2*X(38021) = 5*X(1483)+4*X(12645) = 7*X(1483)-4*X(34748) = 11*X(1483)-20*X(37624) = X(3656)+5*X(3679) = 11*X(3656)-5*X(7982) = 3*X(3656)-5*X(38021) = 11*X(3679)+X(7982) = 19*X(3679)+5*X(11522) = 3*X(3679)+X(38021) = 3*X(7982)-11*X(38021) = 7*X(12645)+5*X(34748)</b>
<p>X(38081) lies on these lines: {2,1483}, {5,3656}, {8,547}, {10,549}, {30,5657}, {40,33699}, {145,15703}, {355,8703}, {381,3617}, {517,38071}, {518,38080}, {519,10172}, {524,38165}, {527,38170}, {528,38177}, {529,38178}, {632,3828}, {944,11812}, {952,3653}, {962,3860}, {1482,10109}, {1656,31145}, {3241,3628}, {3524,28224}, {3564,38087}, {3627,5493}, {3654,15687}, {3655,15713}, {3839,28212}, {3845,4745}, {3858,11362}, {4669,9956}, {4677,5901}, {4678,5071}, {4691,22791}, {5055,5844}, {5066,5818}, {5067,20049}, {5587,23046}, {5762,38097}, {5843,38092}, {5846,38079}, {5853,38082}, {5854,38084}, {5855,38085}, {5881,14869}, {6684,15711}, {9780,10124}, {10056,11545}, {12100,34627}, {12101,34632}, {12245,19709}, {12331,16858}, {12702,14893}, {15702,18526}, {15714,18481}, {17504,26446}, {18480,35404}, {18525,34200}, {19876,37727}, {28198,38127}, {28208,38155}, {28463,32141}, {31399,34641}</p>
<p>
X(38081) = midpoint of X(38066) and X(38074)<br>
X(38081) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10283, 15699), (11539, 19875), (15699, 38042), (17504, 26446), (23046, 5587), (38022, 38083)<br>
X(38081) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3654, 18357, 15687), (5790, 38066, 38074), (5790, 38112, 38138), (5818, 34718, 5066), (38022, 38042, 38083), (38022, 38083, 15699), (38099, 38100, 19875)<br>
</p>
